website_summaries.verdict: Pick this one if you plan to use diatomaceous earth for controlling/killing insects – the bottle and nozzle makes it easy to apply.
pros: Pure and natural diatomaceous earth by a reliable brand in a applicator bottle that is convenient for applying to bedbug infestations or for killing other types of bugs
cons: More expensive than others  considering the quantity, but if you need the applicator bottle it's worth it
Not all users found it effective, but many had satisfactory results

customer_reviews.title: Merciless Insect Destruction in a Bottle
customer_reviews.text: As far as I understand it, this is made of the dried up skeletons of diatoms. If you despise bugs as much as I do, you'll be happy to know that if they traipse through this stuff, it will impale their exoskeletons, causing them to "bleed out" and dry up. A most agonizing end to the most abominable of pests. Huzzah!
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend being extremely generous with it
customer_reviews.text: Was still seeing bed bugs up to 4 days after laying it down, but after that, nothing. So gotta be patient, but it works. I'd recommend being extremely generous with it, laying it down everywhere, especially if the problem is bad, and leaving it for a few weeks. It doesn't kill the eggs so you want to make sure it kills any that are newly hatched or you'll get reinfested. You may be living in powder for a month or so, but it will rid you of the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Works as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Put inside your electrical boxes between the creases. DONT PUT IN THE HOLES. Tape over the holes so you wont get the powder inside the contact point of electricity. I purchased this product for someone else trying to hurry and help with a solution because they couldn't afford an exterminator, I but didn't have any knowledge. I waited a long time to submit a review and this is what they told me. They bought a better product that lasts 10yrs undisturbed, but said this is alright, too. Just have to reapply after a year or so if needed.
customer_reviews.author: stonemax11

customer_reviews.title: Makes You Feel Like a Warlock
customer_reviews.text: In the old days, those who practiced magic would draw wards and runes of protection with special chalks, to keep unseen evils and pestilence at bay. This is a special chalk—really the fossilized skeletons of billions of microorganisms from before the time of the dinosaurs—and, if you pour it into the cracks at the corners of your home, it will keep bugs from coming through those gaps. This is one of the only white powders I know of that can make you feel like a warlock, and all the others are illegal.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Skolnick

customer_reviews.title: this is way better than a fogger
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, this is way better than a fogger. BBs are GONE. I never thought Id say that, I cried over them when they ate me and children up. But the f-bombs are GONE.
customer_reviews.author: Christina A.

customer_reviews.title: Clean bed, clean conscience
customer_reviews.text: I dusted liberally under and around my bed and on the bed frame. No more bites. And I didn't feel like I poisoned myself and the world around me.
customer_reviews.author: standard end user

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Harris products have saved my life. I am so greatful. Bed bugs are traumatizing and embarrassing. I literally had no one to talk to about the issue because people judge. I literally do not know how I got them in my house. But they multiply quickly and it's a battle to beat them. The DE powder and spray are gods gift. I had 3 professional treatments done by orkin and I still has bed bugs. So needless to say I was not happy with orkin. I do not recommend professional treatment. I would recommend the Harris spray and powder and literally covering everything with it. And retreating 10 days later.
customer_reviews.author: Baltimore

customer_reviews.title: it didn't work for me it pissed them off
customer_reviews.text: It seem to be working for others, but for my bed bug problem it seem like it just pissed them off the ate me and my boyfriend up last night. Please tell me what will work I'm tired of scratching and can't sleep
customer_reviews.author: Mr.collins wife

customer_reviews.title: Harris Bed Bug Killer works!
customer_reviews.text: I have been fighting bed bugs for the past year at my mother's place. I have tried the exterminator with no success. I have used sprays that are used at hotels, no success. Then after much research, I came across Harris Bed Bug Killer Diatomaceous earth. So far this seems to be working. My mother doesn't live near me so usually when I get there the bugs are out of control. My last visit, however, was different after using Harris. There were only a few bugs. So I will continue to use this product and hope it will help me get rid of these nasty pests!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Harris

customer_reviews.title: It works! I used a "safe" spray with no ...
customer_reviews.text: It works! I used a "safe" spray with no results. In order to test them both I captured bugs that had just been in the area that was sprayed and kept them in a jar with a little tissue on the bottom. Although they had been sprayed, they thrived for a month. In fact they procreated in there. Once I got this powder, I put a little in the jar. Less than 2 days later, it was a morgue. It kills spiders and flies, as well.
customer_reviews.author: GiGi

customer_reviews.title: The tip on this made it great for the edge of bed seams and around the ...
customer_reviews.text: The tip on this made it great for the edge of bed seams and around the edge of the floorboard. I swear by this stuff for bugs of any kind coming in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda

customer_reviews.title: Diatomaceous: Hard to Spell..Deadly Effective.
customer_reviews.text: Want to banish Satan's advance men and send a message to the Prince of Darkeness himself? Spread a happy trail of diatomaceous earth within and around your comfy places, and the borders you may not control. Desiccate the malignant m-f-ers, and return their denatured souls to sender.
customer_reviews.author: Mason H.

customer_reviews.title: Good item as good service
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended. Good item for killing bed bug along the wall, corner and large areas. Must vacuum after spraying it, the reason is it is not looking good as white powder with various sizes. Not recommended with household pets, small children,dog, etc, from accidental touching, inhale, licking, etc. Not recommended on good, beautiful carpet and hard floor. But it is a very good item for killing bed bug. Stop the major infectation and incoming bed bug arround our bed. No oldor, smell and stain. The Harris bed bug powder is a very effective killer, as well as good effective delivery, best seller and Amazon. Again, many thanks.
customer_reviews.author: VP

customer_reviews.title: It solved my roach problem
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure if I had bed bugs, but after finding a couple bite-like spots on my body I decided to try this for prevention. I also applied it in my kitchen, where I definitely had a roach problem. I haven't seen any bugs in my apartment for two months. I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Curious Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product actually works!
customer_reviews.text: This really works!! I carefully put it in all the locations where bugs travel (bed legs, side of the wall, side of the frame, under the bed frame). No more bugs!
customer_reviews.author: U. Narayanan

customer_reviews.title: Great for garden use, only part of the plan for bedbugs
customer_reviews.text: This is just regular old diatomaceous earth that you can buy form many natural garden centers. It's a nice thing to have around for use against slugs and other garden pests. Harris markets this packaging for bedbug control. The bottle does make it easy to put it right where you want it, whether homemade bedbug traps or lines around your sleeping area. I found this reduced the number of bedbugs, but even with regular applications, we were not able to fully rid ourselves of the obnoxious, persistent creatures. This product might be enough if used very early on in a bedbug infestation, but it wasn't enough for us. It vacuums up easily, and has no odor.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Linnell-Olsen

customer_reviews.title: I totally recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: This product is a life and money saver. using this product along with a steamer that I also found on amazon has helped greatly. I totally recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bamm

customer_reviews.title: I really don't know how to rate this because it ...
customer_reviews.text: I really don't know how to rate this because it wasn't the only thing that I used to get rid of them and ever time I used stuff for one rooom they would run to the next room so I had to treat my whole house.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working. I am a little bit hesitant because that particular product is being phased out by the pool people due to its negative effects on people's breathing.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene A. Meleskie

customer_reviews.title: Don't for work
customer_reviews.text: The container looks big and there are not many products。 I bought this to help in getting rid of the bedbugs we got a couple of months ago. I've read mixed reviews about diatomaceous earth - some people swearing it works wonders for bedbugs, some people saying it totally doesnt work. So, I thought I'd try it. I did a bunch of other measures too, along with the earth, but it didnt seem to make a noticeable difference。So, I probably could have gone without it.
customer_reviews.author: Can

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I use a product we had to floods a hurricane and then a flood and I don't know what we had we called Terminix attitude for Carmike everything they've called in a while so I sprinkled this stuff in my house and killed whatever is in your home it's on its history of the smell because I mean it's open from the inside out but it does the job so I'm happy for fighting this from a little over 3 years is spending a fortune on a bunch of crap promises
customer_reviews.author: Donna Gore

customer_reviews.title: Sadly let down
customer_reviews.text: Poured this stuff on a bedbug and just watched it walk around in it, tried it for 3 days and it was still alive. Had gotten this product to help my mother with her small bedbug problem but all it did was make her sneeze. Wouldn't suggest anyone with asthma use this product. I'm sure it works for some but for us it was a no go, sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Aoreka

customer_reviews.title: It Seems to affect me more than it affects bed ...
customer_reviews.text: It Seems to affect me more than it affects bed bugs. This powder has a strong smell or is just the powder that makes me sneeze all the time and even you can feel how your throat feels dry.
customer_reviews.author: Jaquelin

customer_reviews.title: Very Effective
customer_reviews.text: Very effective even on resistant strains of bed bugs. We combined this with Bed Bug Killer by Ecoraider in areas the dogs would have access to and it was a winning duo. Be careful to store in dry area as it deactivates when wet, it did seem to loose potency in high humidity. Still worked but just a little slower but then that is the nature of this type of product, not a fault of the product itself.
customer_reviews.author: Trudy K. Utzler

customer_reviews.title: Nasty Creatures
customer_reviews.text: Brought one (hopefully) home from my gym bad and I freaked out. Online search listed many, but glad I used this because senstitive to sprays. Placed on box spring/frame, mattress, head frame, and night stands draws - no scent, but be careful becauseof the power and read the label. So far so good keeping my fingers crossed. I will never place any items like boxes/packages on my bed again.
customer_reviews.author: Rah Comment

customer_reviews.title: RECOMMENDED BY EXTERMINATOR PROFESSIONAL!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was expose to bedbugs at a Resort and call a professional exterminator who recommend this product it really kills eggs and bedbugs. Bedbugs can be a real nightmare if not handle correctly. I was given excellent advice and this product works to kill these pests. I now keep this in my garbage just in case. Any one can bring this pest home. Prevention is the key especially if you travel a lot. Beware do your research, knowledge is powder. Really works!!!
customer_reviews.author: LADYDYEANN

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I don't know that I had bedbugs, but I did have dust mites. So I was buying everything to make them go away and clean my rooms. I found that after laying down lots of stuff along with this product that I was satisfied . Anything with boric acid added to it will work.
customer_reviews.author: JazziTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Does not work at all.
customer_reviews.text: I found a bed bug a few weeks ago and also noticed some bites. so I ordered a few things to try and eradicate them. I put this product all around my bed on the floor. I've been seeing some new bites so I decided to go back through everything again. I found a few little nest and all of the bed bugs are covered in this white powder and still moving around like nothing is wrong. after seeing this I am going to go ahead and say it doesn't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: I’ll give a update to see if i see any dead bed bugs
customer_reviews.text: Pretty big looks small in picture decent size in person use it for my hard ware floor has a lot cracks and use it for bed bugs haven’t seen but i did see a spider in the morning cover with powder dead
customer_reviews.author: Sensei senpaii

customer_reviews.title: life saver, glad i went with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: every since putting this out on my bed around my bed, I haven't had any problems with seeing the little critters, thank God, bedbugs are stressful and thank you Harris it has been a breeze to sleep now. still I make sure everything is wash and clean most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: ashley watson

customer_reviews.title: This gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: This did exactly what it was supposed to do. Haven't seen any critters in weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Saintmom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS STUFF! SAFE FOR MY KDS and PETS and WORKS~!~ GET IT~
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 👍👍
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly worked great. I was in a motel that had bed bugs while traveling for work. The company paid for the room so I couldn't just leave for another motel. Management sprayed over and over and the bed bugs kept coming back. Once I used this all around the room, under the and round the bed. Bed bugs were all gone. It was surprising and way cheaper than those chemicals management must of used.
customer_reviews.author: ElementaLizard

customer_reviews.title: YUK!
customer_reviews.text: I threw it out after learning that it can give you respiratory distress.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I had an bed bug issue for over A year!! We steam cleaned the carpets, got new matresses, threw out couches. The bugs still stayed. Finally, using ortho bed bug killer spray in conjuncture WITH diatomaceous earth AND bed bug covers for the mattress and bed spring worked! I am still cautious and re-treat every 2 weeks but this spray was wonderful to treat surfaces directly and the spray nozzle helped me get into the cracks and high places.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren G

customer_reviews.title: Not effective
customer_reviews.text: Lucky for those reviewers who gave a 5 star rating, but it wasn't effective in my case. One bug still came out from the carpet after 2-3 days of leaving the room with this powder sprayed on all areas of the floor. Luckily after that incident, I didn't see any more bugs, but can't say if they all died as before the powder was used, there were only a couple of sightings.
customer_reviews.author: Q Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great barrier and preventative measure
customer_reviews.text: The product works well, however the powder would work better if it was used with a puffer tool instead of squeezing the bottle and having clumps of powder come out. The powder works well as a barrier, but I don't see it killing ants. As for bed bugs, I don't have any beds bugs, I think, because I sprinkled the powder under my mattress and around my bed frame in the cracks.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Works well for dust mite infestations too!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few months ago thinking we had bed bugs and as it turned out, we didn't have any. I hadn't used it until recently when I started getting allergic reactions from dust mites. I used it on my futon and on the first night (last night) I had fewer reactions this morning with maybe only one "bite". This stuff is amazing and I'm glad I bought it when I did! *Edit* We did have bed bugs and I've been using this religiously ever since. It works very well still and killed the few I found today.
customer_reviews.author: HauntedDreamz1

customer_reviews.title: Holy grail
customer_reviews.text: I barely write reviews I think this stuff definitely deserve it. it is totally worth the every pennies. me and my husband have been struggling cleaning bed bugs almost 1 year we ended up paying $300 for professional cleaning but it didn’t it work at all!! they came back in 3 months!! I saw this on amazon and wanted to give a try ($5) . I put it a lot amount under my mattress and bed area everywhere. finally they have totally gone now. it has been 9 months they didn’t come back.. highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ozge

customer_reviews.title: The only reason I bought this product over others was ...
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I bought this product over others was for the tip, hoping it would make it easier to apply to tight spots. The tip barely lets any product puff out, made it very difficult to use. I can't speak for the effectiveness of the product as it hasn't been that long that I've used it, but its been very difficult getting the tip to get any product through
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Used in conjunction with other products I believe this worked great. Perfect for hard to reach area where you can't spray like behind wall outlets. Plus you know it won't wear off. It stays where you put it.
customer_reviews.author: MistreatedTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not for Bed Bugs
customer_reviews.text: I think this product may be effective for ant and roach control or other such critters but it didn't seem to do very much for the bud bug problem I suddenly found my self dealing with on my sofa and living room as a whole. It is messy and just a general pain to use. Made me feel like I had to hold my breath every time I walked into the living room.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin

customer_reviews.title: I don't know if this did the trick..
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea what kind of bug I must have had on my couch. But thinking it was bed bugs, I tried a few of the sprays that were highly recommended and they didn't seem to do a thing. I tried the diatomaceous earth and after a few weeks, no one was getting bitten.
customer_reviews.author: crabjoe

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for my relief of the vampires
customer_reviews.text: using this product is a very good product to keep away bed bugs it definitely helped in my home we did not have infestation but we did have people in apartments that had them it kept them away it's just as effective as using that bug spray and baking soda vacuuming every day worked great
customer_reviews.author: john m.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a general insect repellent and so far it seems to work well at repelling bugs. It is a bit tricky to apply it evenly at times but overall it was not too bad. The only thing I dislike is the power residue it leaves, but that's just the nature of the product and how it works I guess. Happy with it overall.
customer_reviews.author: beccalam13

customer_reviews.title: Bedbugs!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We use this as part of a treatment plan for a bedbug infestation at my grandmother's house. This sTuff Doesn't disappoint! Kill's those little buggers as described. ***Not a paid review***
customer_reviews.author: Amazon-aholic

customer_reviews.title: Got rid of the bedbugs 😄
customer_reviews.text: No more bedbugs! 😄 I would like to recommend to everyone, please read and follow the instructions. You will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Jose Adorno

customer_reviews.title: Does not work. I kept on bed bug with ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. I kept on bed bug with this in a bag.it did not kill the bug for several days. At last I had to spray instant bug killer.
customer_reviews.author: Rodger

customer_reviews.title: Works ok
customer_reviews.text: This product and process is very messy. But in proper applications the powder can assist you. I definitely prefer the spray which cost more for a smaller volume but is much easier to use and effective.
customer_reviews.author: JYE

customer_reviews.title: 100% works!!
customer_reviews.text: I had a huge bed bug problem in the apartment. We had to throw away our luggage bags, mattress etc and wash/dry our clothes and put them in a plastic cover. The leasing agency brought in a fumigator 6 times, I tried using different sprays but we still had a lot of bed bugs. That's when I came across this amazing product. I put this powers all around the room in the gap between the wall and the carpet. I put more powder the next weekend and by the end of the month we completely got rid of the bugs. Kudos to this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: New Yorker

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a week ago and it has been working like a charm. I put it in my box springs and in my chairs and it’s nearly stopped my bed bug problem in their tracks. I do put more every 3-4 days after I use the spray and amazingly it is working! It doesn’t stain or leave an odor. My household is soooo glad!!
customer_reviews.author: Sheree

customer_reviews.title: I was not pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: I was not pleased with this product. I read the reviews and most were good and people said that this product worked. It didn't for me. I had to call an exterminator to combat my problem. The product was a waste of time and money for me.
customer_reviews.author: Twan D. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I feel like mines was already open and someone used it. When vacuum make sure your vacuum have a filter if not the powder would be in your air and I have to open my windows and let the powder out for a whole day. I don’t think it really did much.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Ye

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I was having an issue with bedbugs. I put this in the crevices near the wall. So far it works. I can see that it can be a dusty product. I wore a mask while putting it down.
customer_reviews.author: D.P

customer_reviews.title: Life saver !!
customer_reviews.text: Life saver. Cleaned out my room and put a dash of this all over. Never saw a bed bug again thank god! Its been 4/5 months no bugs and i still see the powder around the walls.
customer_reviews.author: Luz Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Found Bed bugs on my nieces bed after product application
customer_reviews.text: My cousin was having issues with bed bugs bought this for her. she used it twice problem seem to go away then she found bedbugs living in the powder. This bugs where thriving in this product. She had to get an exterminator
customer_reviews.author: Jen G

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with it
customer_reviews.text: My job has bugs that I definitely don't want traveling with me home. Before my purchase I killed 3 bed bugs and a flea at my desk. I took this stuff to work and sprinkled a border around to secure my area. I have not seen another bug in a month now so I think it works.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for rugs and hard to get to places!
customer_reviews.text: Have been fighting bedbugs that who knows how they got to my house. I did not invite them in any way at all. Success is based on the number of bites per day - winning big time.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Wright

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: First night sleeping in our beds again last night was very successful!! No bites! Not one! We had been gone away all summer & came back home to a few critters, YIKES! My kids were terrified & I was disgusted! I thought keeping a clean house meant no insects but that didn't apply for bed bugs. I don't know how they got here but I definitely want them gone. I used this product in combination with eco defense bed bug killer.
customer_reviews.author: Shevondria Hinton

customer_reviews.title: But months later they were still annoying me. This is the perfect solution
customer_reviews.text: A few months ago I bought a bag of potting soil for some plants and the soil was infested with little flying creatures. I thought they would just die out. But months later they were still annoying me. This is the perfect solution. I didn't realize you could buy d-earth in a little squeeze bottle! How perfect!! Also, have seen a significant reduction in flying creatures. Probably would have gotten them all if I had been more methodical about applying this, instead of just squeezing it into the planters that were deep enough to hide the white powder.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Auerbach

customer_reviews.title: safe to use
customer_reviews.text: This powder works on bed bugs and other bugs that have shells such as fleas. It's easy to use and won't harm pets. For bed bugs, we combined it with mattress and box spring bags, spray and traps at the foot of the bed and night stands.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara R

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: One of the best products on the market and I have tried them all. Bed bugs are hard to get rid of and this powder seems very effective.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply and vacuum up
customer_reviews.text: Seems to do the trick. Easy to apply and vacuum up. But I did notice that you need to re-apply every 2 weeks or so.
customer_reviews.author: ejohnson

customer_reviews.title: Effective against bedbugs
customer_reviews.text: This did the trick! I used an N95 respirator and squirted the DE using the built in tip, and this combined with vigorous cleaning and use of Murphy's oil soap cleared the house of bedbugs. We also haven't had any roaches since I applied it, nice bonus!
customer_reviews.author: p

customer_reviews.title: To toss or not to toss 🛌
customer_reviews.text: I'm really not sure if its doing the job. The bed bugs have lessened. I will try the defogger to see if that works. If they keep reappearing, I will toss my dad's mattress.
customer_reviews.author: CHARLIE

customer_reviews.title: Get the big bag of food grade with the puffer. Easier to use
customer_reviews.text: Get the big bag of food grade with the puffer. Easier to use
customer_reviews.author: nothing

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It worked I'm so freaking happy, it killed all the bed bugs (it takes a few days to kill everything and we reapplied it religiously) I guess it doesn't kill eggs because now the eggs have hatched so I'm going to order more to kill the babies
customer_reviews.author: Fataldreamer

customer_reviews.title: Only product that worked!!
customer_reviews.text: I wasted my money on so many sprays and items for other remedies and this powder is the only thing that got rid of them! You have to apply it generously and yes it's messy, but you can clean it up when the bugs are gone (which will be pretty fast). I chose to vacuum the carpet, but leave it under my bed and mattress. I haven't had a problem sense. Cheap, easy to use, and no smell!
customer_reviews.author: Jaidan

customer_reviews.title: Does as described
customer_reviews.text: along with pest control professional treatment, this stuff works. I have used a quarter of it and will continue to sporadically. dont want no more of them measley pest, critters in my house. thanks, seller, great price. highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Earlytimes

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This has worked amazing so far. Unfortunately I had some shifty roommates who had 4 cats locked in their bedroom and all had fleas. They also got a “free mattress” off craigslist aka brought bed bugs into my home. This has worked wonders alongside other things to kill them and debug my house. I would definitely recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Pryor

customer_reviews.title: Great for spreading the earth around without making a giant cloud of dust.
customer_reviews.text: The product works and makes spreading diatomaceous earth so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: D. M. Bar

customer_reviews.title: Depends on Use
customer_reviews.text: Messy, not very easy to use. I live in a three decker and use it to line my front and back doorways because I heard my neighbor had an infestation. Not sure if it worked but I never had an issue so maybe it did.
customer_reviews.author: Cyn

customer_reviews.title: Good use for bed bugs
customer_reviews.text: Thought I may have bed bugs cause I was bitten in 5 spots on my shoulder. Put the powder under mattress and in my couches. Haven't been bitten since. Don't know if I had them or not but better safe than sorry!!!
customer_reviews.author: G. chinn

customer_reviews.title: I have used this product before and it is wonderful!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product before and it is wonderful!!!! I have even referred it to my family and friends. Who needs pest control when you have this product?
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Mills

customer_reviews.title: Hart’s Bed Bug Powder was purchased for an elderly family ...
customer_reviews.text: Hart’s Bed Bug Powder was purchased for an elderly family member who didn’t realize she had bedbugs. The powder was applied a week ago. She already notices fewer bugs in her house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it worked on the few bugs I had, it dries them up
customer_reviews.author: james AL johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: No way to tell if this works or not. You have to trust manufacturer's claim. Only bugs I found in the dust were gnats and a couple small spiders.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous for flea in home removal
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to get rid of fleas. Mixed with baking soda 50/50 rato and one application and fleas are gone!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Chabowski

customer_reviews.title: It makes a mess but it works. #1 very happy customer here.
customer_reviews.text: Omg this work finally I haven't had any bite which im very happy about. I was very surpise this works much better than any liquid I use.
customer_reviews.author: Cristin Barraza

customer_reviews.title: I know it's supposed to take a while to kill them but it just doesn't feel that useful.
customer_reviews.text: I spread it everywhere that a bug would need to go to feed. A month or two later, I finally found a bed bug lightly dusted. I submersed it fully in the poison. 4 hours later it finally died. I know it's supposed to take a while to kill them but it just doesn't feel that useful.
customer_reviews.author: OhBoy

customer_reviews.title: Bed bug killer.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend who did not have a pet but the neighbors did and had trouble with fleas worked very well in apartment situations.
customer_reviews.author: Nannette Renchen

customer_reviews.title: Kills bugs! Dead!
customer_reviews.text: The sprayer didn't spray as well as I would have liked, but I was able to adjust it to work in a clunky way. BUT!!! the bug spray certainly worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Paula D. Hill

customer_reviews.title: ... not kill bed bugs actually i think bed bugs love it because i saw then hiding
customer_reviews.text: it does not kill bed bugs actually i think bed bugs love it because i saw then hiding inside
customer_reviews.author: Amaal

customer_reviews.title: This Works in Combination with Other Products
customer_reviews.text: I vigorously vacuumed the floor, mattress, and box springs, sprayed the box spring and bed frame with bed bug killer, put a protective cover over the mattress and pillows, dusted the box spring and bed frame with this product, and used a bed bug fogger. Problem solved in two days; no more bed bugs!

customer_reviews.text: Do you sweep up the powder or do you leave it down for awhile. How fast does it work.

customer_reviews.title: Office stow away prevention
customer_reviews.text: I work in a heavy traffic area where the clients come in and bring in extra into the office and so I resorted to preventing any stow aways into my home. Therefore having to buy this product in hopes it meets my demands.
customer_reviews.author: r. rimpel

customer_reviews.title: I can't tell really how good it is
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for your products. You know, I can't tell really how good it is, because I just started the treatment, and so I may have to wait a while to see if they are still around or not. I noticed the presence of these bugs early, which makes it easier to get rid of before infestation sets in. Hopefully with all the good stuff I purchased and following the instructions given, the problem will be solved! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Fatou

customer_reviews.title: No more bugs
customer_reviews.text: I think this has helped for after spraying, but even if it doesn't, diatomaceous earth looks great under the microscope
customer_reviews.author: peggiebennett

customer_reviews.title: At first i was sceptical if the powder would cause me any health issue but nothing like that happend
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product and it worked perfectly. At first i was sceptical if the powder would cause me any health issue but nothing like that happend. I sprinkled the powder in cups in which i placed the legs of bed frame. The bugs could not cross the powder. Overall the bugs got reduced by 90% and i am finally getting my sleep.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with Harris's products. The combination between the eco rider spray and the powder are very effective. I highly recommend them. A great none toxic replacement for the pesticide treatment.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product - long lasting - just be careful if you ave pets to keep it away from them.

customer_reviews.title: Ok Price and Works Fast
customer_reviews.text: Works well and gets rid of bed bugs very fast. I used it twice and had a major reduction if bed bugs. I highly recommend this. You may want to buy in store though, as it may be cheaper.

product_meta.title: HARRIS Bed Bug Killer, Diatomaceous Earth (1/2lb)
feature_bullets: Comprehensive - The powder is great for a thorough treatment, as it's able to effectively treat hard to reach areas
Easy Application - The puffer tip makes application simple into cracks and crevices or as a surface treatment
Fast Acting - Insects coming into contact with the powder will die within 48 hours of initial contact
Long Residual - Continues to kill bed bugs for weeks after application as long as it's kept dry
EPA Registered & OMRI Listed - Registered with the Environmental Protection Agency (No. 73729-1-3) for Use in Homes with People/Pets and Listed with the Organic Minerals Research Institute

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars1,817 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
